properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 18 at 11:01AM AST until January 18 at 2:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...NORTHERLY SWELL AND WIND-DRIVEN SEAS WILL GENERATE HAZARDOUS
SEAS ACROSS THE REGION...

.The combination of a northerly swell and wind-driven seas will
generate hazardous seas across the local waters through early
next week. Fresh to strong winds and frequent gusty winds are
also expected during this period.

* WHAT...Small Craft Advisory, east winds 15 to 25 kt and seas 10
to 14 feet expected.

* WHERE...Anegada Passage Southward to 17N.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 PM AST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 PM AST MONDAY
